UI Elements › should display initial UI correctly

UI Elements › should load page within 3 seconds
Tab Navigation › should switch between tabs

Filter Controls › should have log level filter buttons

Performance Tracker › should have performance tracker available in console
Accessibility › should be keyboard navigable
Accessibility › should have proper document title
